USER.comment: username used by script to ssh to proxmox host

HOST.comment: ip-address of proxmox host used by script to ssh to host

TEMPLATE.comment: Proxmox ID of the template the VM should be cloned from

ID.comment: Proxmox ID to assign the new VM

DISK.comment: How much the VM HDD should be expanded to during cloning. Size is in GB. Value must be integer

CORES.comment: vCPU cores assigned to the VM. Value must be integer

MEM.comment: Memory assigned to the VM in MB. Value must be integer

BALLOON.comment: How much is the VM memory allowed to ballon in MB. Using zero disables the ballon driver. Omitting the value = zero

BRIDGE.comment: The network bridge the VM is connected to.

VLAN.comment: The VLAN the VM is connected to.

START_AT_BOOT.comment: Automatic restart after crash. <boolean> (default = 0). 1 to activate.

CLOUDINIT_USER.comment: The default (root) user created on the VM during install.

CLOUDINIT_PW.comment: The default (root) password created on the VM during install.

CLOUDINIT_PUB_KEY.comment: The SSH public key to add the default (root) 'authorized_keys' during install. To allow SSH key authentication. If omitted no public key will be added to the VM user.

CLOUDINIT_NET.comment: The value shpuld be either 'dhcp' or 'static'. If 'static' the section with 'CLOUDINIT_NET_STATIC' keys must be used.

CLOUDINIT_DNS_DOMAIN.comment: The search doamin for the new VM. If 'blank' the (proxmox) host settings will be applied.

CLOUDINIT_DNS_SERVER.comment: The dns server ip-address for the new VM. If 'blank' the (proxmox) host settings will be applied.

CLOUDINIT_UPGRADE.comment: cloud-init: do an automatic package upgrade after the first boot. <boolean> (default = 1). 0 to deactivate.

CLOUDINIT_IP.ci_ipaddress: <Your static ip-address goes here - if used>
CLOUDINIT_IP.comment: cloud-init: static ip-address for the VM, if key: 'ci_network' is set to static

CLOUDINIT_GW.comment: cloud-init: default gateway ip-address, if key: 'ci_network' is set to static

CLOUDINIT_MASK.comment: cloud-init: netmask, if key: 'ci_network' is set to static
